ISSUE.TITLE: Cannot edit return request
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.10 Steps to reproduce the problem: When I try to edit any of the possible actions for return requests, i receive an error SqlException: Cannot insert explicit value for identity column in table 'ReturnRequestAction' when IDENTITY_INSERT is set to OFF. Steps to reproduce bug: Configuration => Settings => Order settings => Tab Return Request Settings => Panel Return request actions: Click Over Edit Button for the item "Repair" => Click "Save" Button

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3384 Return requests could not be edited
